text: The East Lancs MaxCi is a single-decker body of a bus, It has a low-floor, It was built from 1993 to 1995 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. The MaxCi body was built on the Scania N113CRL chassis. In 1995, it was replaced by the East Lancs European. ==References== * Millar, Alan (2007) Bus & Coach Recognition (5th Edition) : Ian Allan Ltd., ==Other websites== * Category:Low-floor buses MaxCi Category:Low-entry buses
title: East Lancs MaxCi
